Text:
Works perfectly.

Thanks, once again, illiria! I got your page on bookmark lol.
Well done, works as advertised. (And what timing for 1.03, I just sat down to start a second run through the game tonight)

I think a Pink Skull should be in order.
Thanks bro.

thanks illiria! how did you get the unlocker for the .exe file? i would rather get that than redownloading the entire thing again... would you mind sharing the unlockable patch too? my ISP throttles for torrent... sigh

Thanks, Illiria!

I got your page bookmarked too, just for the record :)

@ all

Thank you very much for your support, I'm glad to see the work is appreciated. :) And thanks for bookmarking. Although I don't release most of my projects, due to all the hassle writing long Readme for each.

@ inscythe

I didn't think I'd need the patch again, so I've deleted it after I finished with the repack, but I don't know where to get it - it was sent over to me. All I remember is that it's that "patchda2forunlockables.exe" patch, and it is version 1.03. I'm very sorry that I can't be of more help. :(
thanks again friend thanks for doing it and sharing

@illiria

ugh... nvm... thanks for informing anyway. I guess I'll have to get this slowly...
Thank you, I love you ! :-*

@inscythe

this is only 79mb.. we're lucky we got the patch up with dlc this fast. id be happy its there.
Thank you.

@ inscythe

*Sigh* I didn't want to get into this, but since you're asking, I guess I have to reply:

I was told that it is not for public release. Once the creator(s) decide(s) to release it for public, they will. Maybe they have decided to keep it for their site, maybe postpone the public release, I don't know. I was just told not to share it. Use for my release - yes. Share the original - no. I can't tell you more because I myself don't know any more. Let's just be grateful for what we've got, because if I disrespect that request, we may never get 1.04 at all.
once again, ty fellow ;3

Thanks a bunch illiria! I've been waiting for this pack for quite some time now as your packs are much easier to install than the other DLC packs, plus it contains the 1.03 patch and crack, which is a plus. Means less work for me. :)

Yes yes yes!! This was perfect! I was mostly looking for the 1.03 patch, since the game was waaaaay to dark, and I didn't want to have to mess with the config then keep messing with changing the setting in game every time, but getting the DLC along with it was a nice bonus.

This installed incredibly easily, I had the Reloaded crack, didn't have to move, copy, or anything, just run the file, and all is taken care of.
You are AWESOME! :D

Thanks man.
I hope you get your skull!

wow ... that was easy .... installer did everything!!
and everything works too :)
well illiria, what a fine job you did!!
thank you soooo much

I see questions about "Legacy" are coming along. I can't say anything about it yet - I haven't seen it. It seems to be more of an add-on than a DLC however, so I'm not sure what structure will it have. What I will do and whether I will do anything at all depends on the release. It may not the same protection and structure as other DLCs.

@ conorvor

Sorry for a very delayed reply. Install NVIDIA PhysX, you seem to be missing some of its files.

@ lvcifer

If Windows says that the pack has not been installed properly it is very likely a problem with Windows. Windows shouldn't even *know* whether it installs successfully or not. If it pops up a message, it means it tries to tamper with the installation somehow. You might wanna try to disable Windows in-built protection such as UAC or whatever. I don't use Vista/7, can't tell for sure.

When did the class packs (warrior, rogue, mage) get released?  I haven't played DA2 since it came out, but I know I have some of these DLCs but not sure if I have those packs.  If they were released after March then I don't have them.

If that's the case SEEED PLEASE! :D
